name: Dice Factory (Alliones)
description:
WELCOME TO THE DICE FACTRORY!!!

Your goal is to collect as many dice as possible.
How to play:
You can open your collection with the icon at the lower left corner.
In your collection you have all your dice, you can't have a dice twice. On the dice you can see its average and under the dice you see its maximum and its Minimum. ( This can't be the same!)
By clicking on a dice you can decide if you want to place it on the upper or lower field (You can place up  to 6 dices on each, but you have to place at least 1 on each)
Then click the roll buten and wait for all the dice to finsih.
By clicking on the mathematical operators you can now change the result of your field. (This result can't be less then 1 or greater than 100)
With the two results a new dice will be created. By clicking the "Save Dice" button the dice will be added to your collection. If the dice fits the active quest, which you can see in the lower left corner you will get a additional rolls.

Have Fun!!!
